Author: pinapelz
Name: Malmstone Calculator
Punchline: Keep tabs on how much more PVP you have to play before unlocking your next Series Malmstone reward!
Description:
Calculates the number of wins/losses needed in different modes of PVP before achieving your target Series Level
- Receive post-match notifications about progress towards next Series Level
- Track and display Series Level above 30
- Calculate Frontline losing streak bonus rewards

Use /pmalm to get started
